value="ua">Ukraine</option><option value="ae">United Arab Emirates</option><option value="us">United States</option><option value="uy">Uruguay</option><option value="uz">Uzbekistan</option><option value="ve">Venezuela</option></select></div></li>
<li><div class="label">Continent</div><div><select class="" name="continent" style=""><option value="" selected="">-</option><option value="EU">Europe</option><option value="OC">Oceania</option><option value="AS">Asia</option><option value="NA">North-America</option><option value="AF">Africa</option><option value="SA">South-America</option><option value="AN">Antartica</option></select></div></li>
<li><div class="label">PCS Points</div><div><input type="text" class="" name="pnts" value="" style="" autocomplete="off"><input type="text" class="hide" name="zpnts" value="" style="" autocomplete="off"></div><div><select name="ppnts" class="selectOperator " style=" padding: 1px; "><option value="equal" selected="">=</option><option value="smallerorequal">&lt;=</option><option value="largerorequal">&gt;=</option><option value="smaller">&lt;</option><option value="larger">&gt;</option><option value="between">Between</option></select></div></li>
<li><div class="label">Race level</div><div><select class="" name="level" style=""><option value="" selected="">-</option><option value="pro">Level 1 and higher</option><option value="hc">HC and higher</option><option value="wt">WorldTour</option></select></div></li>
<li><div class="label">Result</div><div><input type="text" class="" name="rnk" value="" style="" autocomplete="off"><input type="text" class="hide" name="zrnk" value="" style="" autocomplete="off"></div><div><select name="prnk" class="selectOperator " style=" padding: 1px; "><option value="equal" selected="">=</option><option value="smallerorequal">&lt;=</option><option value="largerorequal">&gt;=</option><option value="smaller">&lt;</option><option value="larger">&gt;</option><option value="between">Between</option></select></div></li>
<li><div class="label">Exclude TTT</div><div><input type="hidden" name="exclude_tt" value="0"><input type="checkbox" name="exclude_tt" value="1"></div></li>
<li><div class="label">Racedate</div><div><input type="text" class="datepickerNormal " name="racedate" value="" autocomplete="off"><input type="text" class="datepickerNormal hide" name="zracedate" value="" autocomplete="off"></div><div><select name="pracedate" class="selectOperator " style=" padding: 1px; "><option value="equal" selected="">=</option><option value="smallerorequal">&lt;=</option><option value="largerorequal">&gt;=</option><option value="between">Between</option></select></div></li>
<li><div class="label">Racename</div><div><input type="text" class="" name="name" value="" style="" autocomplete="off"></div><div><select name="pname" class="selectOperator hide" style=" padding: 1px; "><option value="contains" selected="">Contains ..</option></select><span style="display: inline-block; padding: 2px; ">(Contains ..)</span></div></li>
<li><div class="label">Category</div><div><select class="" name="category" style=""><option value="" selected="">-</option><option value="1">ME - Men Elite</option><option value="2">WE - Women Elite</option><option value="3">MU - Men U23</option><option value="4">MJ - Men Juniors</option><option value="6">WJ - Women Juniors</option><option value="0">-</option><option value="7">WU - Women U23</option><option value="8">ME + WE</option></select></div></li>
<li><div class="label">ProfileScore</div><div><input type="text" class="" name="profile_score" value="" style="" autocomplete="off"><input type="text" class="hide" name="zprofile_score" value="" style="" autocomplete="off"></div><div><select name="pprofile_score" class="selectOperator " style=" padding: 1px; "><option value="largerorequal" selected="">&gt;=</option><option value="smallerorequal">&lt;=</option><option value="between">Between</option></select></div></li>
<li><div><input type="submit" name="filter" value="Filter"></div></li></ul><input type="hidden" name="id" value="alberto-contador"><input type="hidden" name="p" value="results"></form>
